Legends.moves.quickOutcome.name: Quick Outcome
Legends.moves.quickOutcome.fail: The Narrator decides on a narrative development detrimental to the Hero, and can give or remove a tag or status in a way that hinders the Hero.
Legends.moves.quickOutcome.partial:
The action unfolds as expected, or better, achieving its intended goal or overcoming an obstacle. The Narrator can also give you a useful tag or status.
The Narrator decides on a narrative development detrimental to the Hero, and can give or remove a tag or status in a way that hinders the Hero.
Legends.moves.quickOutcome.success:
The action unfolds as expected, or better, achieving its intended goal or overcoming an obstacle. The Narrator can also give you a useful tag or status.
You can Push your Luck:
Accept Consequences for Great Success (Quick) or for +1 Power to spend (Detailed).
Legends.moves.trackedOutcome.name: Detailed Outcome
